divs: Sighting DetailsI was on the beach across from the Malibu Fish place on PCH around 8:30pm waiting for a mufon researcher (Alex) and he never showed (got lost) and meanwhile I went across to the beach and looked up and the attached photos are what I saw..don't know if it's a plane or ufo but it was going incredibly fast and disappeared then reappeared ..then was gone ..I had time to open my car door very quickly grab my camera and shoot.. It was like doing curly-qu designs ...it went across the sky from left to right then stopped and disappeared then reappeared a distance away..more curly qus..I thought it was so cool and beautiful..but that it was just a normal plane except I never knew one that could do this
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Malibu
There were no other sightings in Malibu on or around September 22nd 2005
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: design in the sky, disapeared then reappeared and small designs then it was gone
